
state={
	id=250	# North Heilongjiang
	name="STATE_250"

	history={
		owner = ROC
		add_core_of = ROC
		set_variable = { division_limit_infrastructure_weight = 5 } # 5 because theres not much around here
		victory_points = { 6615 1 }	# Heihe
		
		set_variable = { state_religion_buddhism = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_shinto = 0 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_christianity = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_taoism = 0.3 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_confucianism = 0.5 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_secularism = 0.1 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_cthulhu = 0 }
	}

	provinces={
		12 44 114 136 169 336 447 474 530 629 647 726 790 868 912 954 985 996 1049 1055 1180 1202 1330 1343 1405 1432 1535 1552 1700 1829 1865 1884 2007 2009 2042 2149 2184 2188 2223 2232 2278 2306 2350 2405 2555 2727 2749 2848 2958 2996 3035 3164 3175 3239 3258 3259 3389 3418 3495 3515 3528 3608 3617 3671 3732 3782 3813 3824 3852 3907 3973 4053 4244 4252 4297 4440 4537 4587 4611 4642 4776 4780 4796 4817 4938 4957 5092 5136 5241 5244 5317 5388 5479 5662 5663 5667 5751 5867 5906 6124 6148 6174 6191 6215 6234 6262 6271 6332 6358 6393 6470 6510 6530 6574 6580 6615 6689 6720 6818 6858 6876 6953 6980 7066 7175 7176 7177 7178 7179 7212 7213 7214 7216 7231 7239 7241 7244 7253 7257 7258 7260 7263 7267 7269 7275 7278 7279 7282 7283 7285 7295 7300 7308 7314 7315 7322 7326 7329 7331 7334 7341 7343 7344 7348 7354 7357 7360 7361 7362 7364 7368 7374 7375 7377 7378 7381 7401 
	}
	manpower=567827
